name: inappeasable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An inappeasable feeling or emotion cannot be satisfied or made less: The inappeasable passion for solitude drove him into the forest. People are greedy because they just have an inappeasable desire for more.
An inappeasable person cannot be calmed or satisfied whatever you do: The baby was inappeasable. Full one moment, an hour later he was hungry again. They tried to calm her, but even they could see that she was inappeasable.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had an inappeasable thirst for information.Part of being human is the inappeasable desire to understand the world around us.These journeys of exploration were undertaken by those with the inappeasable ambition to find out what lies beyond the horizon.
